channel.title: A weired request
channel.description:
Hi, ive only got about 100 character files on my new server because ive only had it up a few hours. Anyway
there was an admin who was spawning on my server and i banned him because he broke rules by spawning like 999m phats and dropped them. So...
is there a file or .bat file that i can use to search through the account and find out which ones have rares? like it searches the party hat and santa codes and such?
thanks

item.title: A weired request
item.dc:creator: @Deviation_Scape Deviation Scape
item.description:
@Deviation_Scape wrote:

nope =\

I would just delete everyone, and start over

Read full topic

item.title: A weired request
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

oh shoot…

i didnt relise i had the wrong char file… ive got 1.7k chars wdf… anyone got a way of deleting all files that are 2kb? because the 2kb are normally lvl 3’s and higher are people with stuff

that would narrow it down alot

Read full topic

item.title: A weired request
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

[quote=“i_own_pking, post:1, topic:108261”]Hi, ive only got about 100 character files on my new server because ive only had it up a few hours. Anyway

there was an admin who was spawning on my server and i banned him because he broke rules by spawning like 999m phats and dropped them. So…

is there a file or .bat file that i can use to search through the account and find out which ones have rares? like it searches the party hat and santa codes and such?

thanks[/quote]

neit youll have to go through character files 1 by 1 to get all the rares… or just delete all char files and start over or you can just wait it out and find out who has them by seeing them with them

Read full topic
